treatment.taxon_hierarchy: family Asteraceae;tribe Anthemideae;genus Artemisia;species globularia;subspecies globularia;
treatment.description: Flowering stems 2–12(–16) cm. Corollas reddish black, eglandular. Cypselae ca. 2.5 mm, margins with relatively narrow ribs. 2n = 18, 36.

habitat_info.text: arctic and alpine tundra , interior mountains ;
habitat_info.habitat: arctic and alpine tundra , interior mountains

treatment.discussion: The red color of the glabrous corollas and the larger heads of subsp. globularia distinguish it from the morphologically similar Artemisia glomerata.
